QuestData.Title: Part of the Pride
QuestData.Description:
Pelodis insists that phalynx are superior to all autonomous beings, taking orders without fail.
But where is the nuance? Where is the reward for your effort?
Larions make fantastic companions, but you must build a relationship with them. Introduce yourself to my pride. You will see that each has a personality of their own.
QuestData.RewardText: My pride is generally wary of newcomers, but they seem to accept your presence.
